question: Which of the following statements are true regarding a DHCP option set?

answers.A: To modify the DHCP option set of a VPC, you need to create new DHCP option set and associate it with the VPC
answers.B: Once the DHCP option set is created, its parameters can be modified anytime
answers.C: Not every VPC has one DHCP option set
answers.D: It is a network protocol that dynamically assigns IP addresses to instances in a VPC
